sentences.en: By tacit agreement they turned to the wine to dispel their discontent.
sentences.cn: 他们不约而同的想拿酒杀气.

sentences.en: How can we dispel their doubts and fears?
sentences.cn: 我们怎能消除他们的疑虑与恐惧?

sentences.en: Introduce a few good dispel scar products, not of Yao Taigui.
sentences.cn: 介绍几款好的祛疤产品, 不要太贵的.

sentences.en: Light poured into the hall, dispelling the shadows.
sentences.cn: 阳光洒进大厅，驱散了阴影。

sentences.en: Pen presently tried to dispel the silence by making a great rattling and noise.
sentences.cn: 潘为了冲淡这种冷场,便嘻嘻哈哈大声谈笑.

sentences.en: Please put on this plaster, which can dispel wind and relieve pain.
sentences.cn: 请贴这种药膏, 它能散风止痛.

sentences.en: The company is trying to dispel rumour about a take - over.
sentences.cn: 公司力图澄清有关接管的流言.

sentences.en: The company is trying to dispel rumours about a take - over.
sentences.cn: 公司力图澄清有关控制权转移的流言.

sentences.en: The force of her faith in Lily must have helped to dispel his hesitations.
sentences.cn: 自己对丽莉的信任一定帮助过他驱散心中的疑云.

sentences.en: The President is attempting to dispel the notion that he has neglected the economy.
sentences.cn: 有人认为总统忽视了经济，总统正试图消除这种看法。

sentences.en: This brief experiment would dispel any further doubts you might entertain.
sentences.cn: 这简单的实验定能祛除你尚存的一点怀疑.

sentences.en: This brief experiment would dispel any further doubts you might have.
sentences.cn: 这一简单的试验会消除你可能存有的一切疑虑.

sentences.en: Tree of Life ( Restoration ): Can now cast Dispel Curse.
sentences.cn: 生命之树 ( 恢复 ): 现在可以解诅咒.

sentences.en: Veterinarians and servicemen can and should help dispel this apprehensions by maintaining high ethical standards.
sentences.cn: 兽医师和管理人员能够并且也应当通过保持高度的道德标准帮助驱逐这种恐惧.

sentences.en: We are trying to dispel his doubts.
sentences.cn: 我们正试图消除他的疑虑.

sentences.en: We want to dispel the myth that you cannot eat well in Britain.
sentences.cn: 我们要消除在英国吃不好的误解。

sentences.en: Why don't you smoke your pipe a little to dispel the stench of his tobacco? "
sentences.cn: 请你抽一会烟斗罢,解解他的烟毒. ”

trans.tran_en: to make something go away, especially a belief, idea, or feeling

trans.tran_cn: 消除（疑虑等），驱散（云雾等），驱逐
trans.tran_en: to make something go away, especially a belief, idea, or feeling
